This is a community-sourced list of services and resources that you might find useful. If you're a member of NHS staff, it's worth knowing that you can self-refer to your occupational health services if you feel you need additional support.

## Urgent / out of hours

+ For urgent/life-threatening matters affecting you or another, call 999 or attend A&E
+ [NHS 24](https://www.nhs24.scot/), and their [services for mental health](https://www.nhsinform.scot/illnesses-and-conditions/mental-health/mental-health-support/mental-health-services-at-nhs-24/), or call 111 for 24/7 help
+ The Samaritans - call 116 123
+ Text 'SHOUT' to 85258 - 24/7 mental health crisis text line
+ HOPELINE247 - call 0800 068 4141

## Mental health support

+ [Scottish Action for Mental Health](https://www.samh.org.uk/). Their [wellbeing assessment tool](https://www.samh.org.uk/about-mental-health/self-help-and-wellbeing/wellbeing-assessment-tool) is extremely helpful.
+ [MIND guidance on anxiety](https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/types-of-mental-health-problems/anxiety-and-panic-attacks/self-care/)
+ Breathing space - confidential support for low mood, depression, anxiety. Available 6pm-2am weekdays, 6pm-6am weekends. Call 0900 838 587
+ [Suicide Prevention Scotland podcast series](https://www.suicideprevention.scot/work/youfirst) and their [resource directory](https://www.suicideprevention.scot)
+ [MyApp](https://rightdecisions.scot.nhs.uk/myapp-my-mental-health/?searchTerm=myapp)
+ [NHS mental health info and advice](https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/)
+ [SANE](https://sane.org.uk) - out-of-hours helpline between 6-11pm. Call 0300 304 7000
+ [Mental health UK resources](https://mentalhealth-uk.org/help-and-information/downloadable-resources/)

## Bereavement

+ [National Bereavement Alliance](https://nationalbereavementalliance.org.uk/support/)
+ [Maggie's Centres Bereavement Groups](https://www.maggies.org/support-information/support-family-friends/bereavement-support/) for families and friends of those who have passed from cancer
+ [Support Around Death Scotland](https://www.sad.scot.nhs.uk/)
+ [Cruse Scotland](https://www.crusescotland.org.uk/)

## Stress

+ [NHS Scotland Work-related Stress Policy](https://www.gov.scot/publications/nhsscotland-once-scotland-workforce-policies-managing-health-work-public-consultation-2/pages/7/)

## Org- and area-specific

+ [ALISS](https://www.aliss.org/) lists local services. Enter your postcode and distance prepared to travel and it gives you a list of services.  

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)

read_csv("data/support_resources.csv") |>
  mutate(url = case_when(
    is.na(url) ~ url,
    TRUE ~ paste0("<a href='", url, "'>Link</a>")))  |>
  datatable(escape = F, filter = "top", options = list(pageLength = -1))

```
